name: ChikungunyaVirusDiseaseTestsForChikungunyaVirusNucleicAcid
title: Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Chikungunya Virus nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chikungunya),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests,  donor tests,  interpretation 
- All other Arboviral conditions)
